generated_body: The article about the last known Pearl Harbor survivor in Massachusetts who has died at the age of 98 is likely to provide a reflective overview of his life and contributions, particularly during World War II. Readers can expect details about his experiences during the attack on Pearl Harbor, along with insights into his post-war life and how he was involved in commemorative events. The piece may also touch on the significance of his passing, highlighting the dwindling number of surviving veterans from that pivotal moment in history and what their stories mean for contemporary understanding of the past.
